All Classes

Class Description
AmbientLight
AmbientLight class implementation [The light of the background scene.
Camera
Camera class implementation [The position where all the rays are coming from (In order to avoid the opposite implementation in which the camera 'gathering' all the rays from the environment)]
CameraTest
Testing Camera Class
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Coordinate
Class Coordinate is the basic class representing a coordinate for Cartesian coordinate system.
Cylinder
Represents a cylinder
CylinderTest
Unit tests for geometries.Cylinder class
DirectionalLight
Directional Light class
FinalPictureTest
Test rendering complicated image
FiniteLight
both Point&Spot light gets area This improve gives us the ability to effect of shadow-value range (instead of 0-1)
Geometries
This class works as base to the design pattern 'Composite'
GeometriesTest
Test class to check if the findIntersection() method works correctly in order to perform the composite
Geometry
Used by any geometrical body
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
ImageWriterTest  
Intersectable
In order to force geometry implement findIntersections()
Intersectable.GeoPoint
static class By using Intersectable.GeoPoint we'll have access to all the shapes in Geometry and it'll help us later in Identify the shapes in the scene by a point
Light
abstract light class
LightSource
Light source interface
LightsTests
Test rendering abasic image
Main
Test program for the 1st stage
Material
Represents a material.Phong model gives us the ability to describe the way a surface reflects light as a combination of Diffusive & Specular scalars + Ambient (From the scene) + Emission (From object)
Plane
Represents a Plane in the 3D space
PlaneTest
Unit tests for geometries.Plane class
Point3D
Represents a point in the 3D space
PointLight
Point light class
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
PolygonTests
Testing Polygons
RadialGeometry
Abstract class that represents geometric shapes with radius
Ray
set of points on line
RayCameraTest
Unit tests for camera-ray integration
ReflectionRefractionTests
Tests for reflection and transparency functionality, test for partial shadows (with transparency)
Render
Render class implementation
RenderTests
Test rendering abasic image
Scene
Represents a 3D scene
ShadowTests
Testing basic shadows
Sphere
Represents a sphere
SphereTest
Unit tests for geometries.Sphere class
SpotLight
Light class which represents SpotLight
Triangle
Represents a triangle in the 3D space
TriangleTest
Unit tests for geometries.Triangle class
Tube
Represents a tube
TubeTest
Unit tests for geometries.Tube class
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy
Vector
Represents a primitives.Vector in the 3D space
VectorTest
Tests for Vector
